page.title: 08A VISIT TO THE LIBRARY
page.content: When I have finished reading my library books,I go to the library to exchange them for up to six books of my choice.In the entrance to the library I give my books to a lady who runs an electronic pen over an attached code at the front of the book.This shows if I have returned my books late,in which case I have to pay 10p per day per book.Having chosen my books the lady at the exit will run a pen over the attached code which will record on a computer when the book was borrowed. Adults in some libraries can borrow framed pictures,records or audio-cassettes.Membership of the library is free.You may use the library to read a selection of newspapers,magazines or to refer to books for information.
